      Methods in org.openlca.core.results that return IMatrix 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IMatrix ContributionResult.getSingleFlowImpacts()
      Get the single LCIA category result for each intervention flow in a matrix where the LCIA categories are mapped to the rows and the intervention flows to the columns.
      IMatrix ContributionResult.getSingleFlowResults()
      Get the single flow results in a matrix where the flows are mapped to the rows and the process-products to the columns.
